result.reason: Requesting an integrated SFTP file browser sidebar (MobaXterm-style) — a major new feature requiring a full file manager UI component and SSH.NET integration, far outside the scope of a remote connections manager and with no active development in 5+ years.
result.approach: Close as out-of-scope; mRemoteNG is a connection manager, not a full SSH client with file browser. Users can use standalone SFTP clients (WinSCP, FileZilla) alongside mRemoteNG.
